algorithms

Class AStar

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.AStar

  • public class AStar
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements the A* algorithm when searching for the best shortest path between two given points in a city map. The heuristic used to calculate the future cost is the distance between two points.

    • Method Detail

      • shortestPath

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> shortestPath(CityMap map,
                                                                 Road startRoad,
                                                                 java.lang.String destinationName,
                                                                 boolean destinationIsRoad)
        Method to get the shortest path between a road and its destination. The destination can be the name of a road (destinationIsRoad = true) or the name of an intersection (destinationIsRoad = false).
        Parameters:
        map - - city structure
        startRoad - - Road of start
        destinationName - - String name of an intersection or a road
        destinationIsRoad - - True if the destinationName is the name of a road or False if it's the name of an intersection.
        Returns:
        - ArrayList with the names of roads to follow to reach the destination or empty if it failed to calculate a path.
